definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Reuse and recycle. Re-purpose plastic containers and cardboard boxes where you can.
sentences.chinese: 在你能够的地方重复使用塑料容器和硬纸板盒子。

sentences.english: In China, coffins made of cardboards were available.
sentences.chinese: 在中国可以买到硬纸板制成的棺木。

sentences.english: His mother used cardboard to section off a small pantry.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲用硬纸板隔了一小间食品室。

sentences.english: Home is this cardboard box just next to the soup kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我家就是这个硬纸皮箱，邻近救济所。

sentences.english: We're making fun of your cardboard cut-out.
sentences.chinese: 我们是拿你的硬纸剪画开玩笑。

sentences.english: Add extra layers of cardboard to the corners of your box and use plenty of Duct tape to hold it tight.
sentences.chinese: 在盒子的角落处添加几层硬纸板，用大量胶带缠牢。

sentences.english: The sawdust goes to the chipboard industry.
sentences.chinese: 锯木屑则送到硬纸板工厂。

sentences.english: Glue the spool to the cardboard on top of the hole.
sentences.chinese: 在洞的上方把线圈轴粘到硬纸板上。

sentences.english: I fixed it with cardboard and tacks.
sentences.chinese: 我用硬纸板和大头钉把它固定好了。

sentences.english: Don Lucho has created an entire apartment out of cardboard and paper.
sentences.chinese: 唐卢乔用硬纸板和纸做了一整套公寓。

sentences.english: Slide the cardboard inside, between the lower sole and the wadding.
sentences.chinese: 将硬纸板放进鞋底下片和填充棉之间。

sentences.english: On the floor close to the captain's hand was a little round piece of paper, blackened on one side.
sentences.chinese: 老船长手边的地上有一小片圆的硬纸，一面涂着黑色。

sentences.english: Each stack of sheets is combined with a backer sheet of chipboard or heavy paper.
sentences.chinese: 每个表的堆栈是结合靠山表的硬纸板或重磅纸。

sentences.english: You are rich, because some live in cardboard boxes.
sentences.chinese: 你富有，这是因为有人住在硬纸皮的箱子里。

sentences.english: And then I cut some small flowers, stems and leaves from construction paper.
sentences.chinese: 然后我从硬纸那剪了一些小花，茎，叶子。

sentences.english: Please sort these products and write down their brands on sheets of card-board.
sentences.chinese: 请将这些产品归类，并在硬纸板上写下品牌名称。

definition: a piece, scrap or fragment of paper
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
